name: Reaction
description:
This game is currently under development. Input and feedback as well as bug reports are appreciated.

Fly your way through a seemingly abandoned space station after your ship has suffered an accident and is need of repair.  Each section will give you a limited amount of fuel(acceleration) and oxygen(time) to complete it. To fix your ship explore the station and discover what happened to it.

Controls

W - Accelerate forwards 

A - Accelerate left 

D - Accelerate right 

Q - Rotate ship left 

E - Rotate ship right 

Space - Halt all rotation

On the main screen there is input in the bottom left corner to manually set what the current highest level achieved is. Use it if you would like to skip ahead to see further levels.
